video.title: Mouk
video.synopsis: As they travel the globe, young cyclists Mouk and Chavapa discover the beauties, mysteries and thrills of foreign lands, from New York to Madagascar.

episodes.synopsis: The buddies bring a good luck charm to a friend competing in a camel race in the Sahara Desert; Mouk and Chavapa join an archeological dig in Tassili.
episodes.title: Lucky Charm / The Desert Archaeologists

episodes.synopsis: Mouk and Chavapa help a Greek postman deliver invitations to a mysterious village fair; the buddies enter an all-white world, ice fishing in Canada.
episodes.title: Urgent Delivery! / Stone Giants

episodes.synopsis: Mouk and Chavapa search for a Japanese woman who mistakenly took their bag; The travelers help a drummer who's playing at an African wedding.
episodes.title: The Birthday Present / A Helping Hand

episodes.synopsis: Mouk disregards local customs when watching turtle eggs hatch in Madagascar; the globetrotters get stranded in the Andes when they miss their bus.
episodes.title: Turtle Time / Whoops, We Missed the Bus

episodes.synopsis: Mouk and Chavapa come face-to-face with crocodiles on a Venezuelan river; Mouk and Chavapa help their friend's father open a peaceful Japanese garden.
episodes.title: The Great Crossing / Small Is Beautiful

episodes.synopsis: The buddies discover amazing animals in the rainforest of Venezuela; Mouk and Chavapa play a game that could ruin the rice fields in Vietnam.
episodes.title: The Stick That Walked Away / In the Paddy Fields

episodes.synopsis: Popo and Mita ask their friends to photograph a tea harvest in Darjeeling, India; An Indian girl guides Mouk and Chavapa through a Holi celebration.
episodes.title: Out of Contact / Holi

episodes.synopsis: In Brazil, the buddies watch a big football match until an albatross gets in the way; Mouk and Chavapa hike to a mountaintop monastery in Tibet.
episodes.title: Goal! / In Search of the Yeti

episodes.synopsis: In Senegal, Mouk and Chavapa visit a "magician" who creates art from recycled objects; In Crete, Mouk and Chavapa help a young girl compete in a race.
episodes.title: As Good as New! / Bicycle Race

episodes.synopsis: Mouk and Chavapa encounter piñata problems at a Mexican birthday bash; the duo sees odd sea creatures in Venezuela and helps a dolphin stuck in a net.
episodes.title: Viva la Pinata! / Pink Dolphin

episodes.synopsis: In Canada, Mouk's scarf flies away and gets caught in a caribou's antlers; the world travelers visit a friend who lives in the Arizona desert.
episodes.title: In Search of the Caribou / Don't Judge a Cactus by Its Prickles

episodes.synopsis: In India, Mouk and Chavapa help twin sisters find and paint an elephant for their grandmother's birthday; The friends get lost in Australia's outback.
episodes.title: The Best Dressed Elephant / Star Struck

episodes.synopsis: The duo herds cows with an Argentinian gaucho; when Chavapa breaks a vase doing a Bollywood dance, a local potter helps him and Mouk make a new one.
episodes.title: Yee Ha Cowboy / The Indian Vase

episodes.synopsis: Mouk and Chavapa hunt for treasure in Tokyo; The friends travel up the Amazon River and get stuck in a tree gilder above the rain forest canopy.
episodes.title: Paper Chase / Above the Trees

episodes.synopsis: Mouk and Chavapa help friends throw a party on an ancient boulevard in Madagascar; In Tibet, Mouk and Chavapa learn to milk a yak and go on a trek.
episodes.title: Baobab Café / The Art of Milking a Yak

episodes.synopsis: A Canadian friend teaches Mouk and Chavapa how to harvest maple syrup; in Egypt, the globetrotters rent a dhow and sail down the Nile.
episodes.title: Yummy, Maple Syrup! / Nile and Easy

episodes.synopsis: Mouk and Chavapa help out a local rock band in the Australian bush; travel snafus threaten to spoil the duo's plans of seeing Peru's Nazca drawings.
episodes.title: Wallabies' Rock / Giant Drawings

episodes.synopsis: Mouk and Chavapa discover a clever system that brings water to the Chilean desert; Shopping in New York, the pair spots people who look very familiar.
episodes.title: The Cloud Catcher / A Message for You

episodes.synopsis: On the island of Crete, Mouk and Chavapa help release baby fish into the sea; While touring Japan, Chavapa breaks a friend's robot, and it goes crazy!
episodes.title: Little Fish Grow Up / Runaway Robot

episodes.synopsis: In Hong Kong, the friends help find a boy's escaped pet bird; In Utah, Mouk and Chavapa see dinosaur tracks and hunt for a lizard.
episodes.title: Birdsong / Dinosaur Trail

episodes.synopsis: Mouk and Chavapa play hide-and-seek on a bamboo plantation in Vietnam; Mouk and Chavapa celebrate cherry blossoms in Japan.
episodes.title: The Bamboo Plantation / Hanami

episodes.synopsis: In Canada, hungry animals steal the picnic Mouk and Chavapa packed; In Australia, the buddies help the Wallabies, a musical group, shoot their video.
episodes.title: Shooting Stars / Wallabies' Clip

episodes.synopsis: Mouk and Chavapa help put on a puppet show in a Vietnamese village; The friends help their musical Brazilian pal prepare to play bossa nova.
episodes.title: Puppet Masters / Bossa Nova

episodes.synopsis: Mouk and Chavapa travel by rickshaw to see the Taj Mahal at sunset; Mouk and Chavapa want to decorate for Christmas in Madagascar.
episodes.title: Rickshaw / Christmas in the Sun

episodes.synopsis: In Morocco, the buddies shop at the souq for cinnamon, almonds and adventure; Mouk and Chavapa search for the Venezuelan fruit used to make maracas.
episodes.title: Souq Surprise / Instruments Do Grow on Trees!

episodes.synopsis: Chavapa celebrates his birthday at the North Pole; When their computer crashes in Bolivia, Mouk and Chavapa learn an exotic way to communicate.
episodes.title: Aurora Borealis / The Parrot Feather

episodes.synopsis: Mouk and Chavapa use a satellite tracker to find a legendary pheasant in Borneo; The buddies try to retrace their steps in a Japanese town.
episodes.title: The Bird Hunt / A Forgetful Day

episodes.synopsis: In Canada, Mouk and Chavapa try to free an owl trapped in a shed; The buddies run into trouble when their bus breaks down in the Australian outback.
episodes.title: Two Wheeled Hero / Windmill

episodes.synopsis: Mouk and Chavapa pick apricots on the hillsides of Crete; Mouk and Chavapa help Cassandra repair her xylophone so she can perform at a Greek festival.
episodes.title: Pottery / The Village Festival

episodes.synopsis: Mouk and Chavapa play ice hockey in Canada and meet a hockey champion; In the Sahara Desert, the buddies try to barter with the Berbers.
episodes.title: Hockey / The Barter
